publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6000 Ken Macintosh: Williamwood High School—That the Parliament congratulates the staff, parents and pupils of Williamwood High School on becoming the best performing state school in Scotland; applauds Williamwood on achieving the highest percentage of S5 pupils gaining five or more Highers in Scotland; commends the high standards of education across the whole of East Renfrewshire, and considers that this illustrates that state schools under local authority control can and do achieve excellence.

S3M-6000 Ken Macintosh: Williamwood High School—That the Parliament congratulates the staff, parents and pupils of Williamwood High School on becoming the best performing state school in Scotland; applauds Williamwood on achieving the highest percentage of S5 pupils gaining five or more Highers in Scotland; commends the high standards of education across the whole of East Renfrewshire, and considers that this illustrates that state schools under local authority control can and do achieve excellence.
